languages.text: Горящая цель каждый раунд получает {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}. Также каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} она выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. Если горящая цель успешно проходит проверку, то она перестает гореть после того, как получит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от эффекта. Также эффект горения спадает после боя, после применения некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} или если персонаж падает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}.

A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

Если горящая цель успешно проходит проверку, то она перестает гореть после того, как получит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от эффекта. Также эффект горения спадает после боя, после применения некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} или если персонаж падает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}.

The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire damage from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain abilities, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

languages.text: Ein brennendes Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Das Ziel führt darüber hinaus jede Runde eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} durch. Besteht das Ziel diese Probe, hört es zu brennen auf, ehe es den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den Effekt eine weitere Runde erleidet. Alternativ wird der Verbrennen-Effekt am Ende des Kampfes mit Hilfe bestimmter {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} oder durch {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Bewusstlosigkeit{/g} entfernt.
languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennendes{/g} Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Das Ziel führt darüber hinaus jede Runde eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch. Sollte das Ziel diesen Test bestehen, hört es zu brennen auf, bevor es den Schaden durch den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} eine weitere Runde erleidet. Alternativ wird der Verbrennen-Effekt zum Ende des Kampfes mit Hilfe bestimmter {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} entfernt, oder falls der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} wird.

languages.text: Une cible frappée par l'effet Combustion subit des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Elle effectue également un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} à chaque round. Si elle réussit ce test, elle cesse de se consumer avant de subir un nouveau round de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de feu émanant de cet effet. L'effet Combustion est supprimé à la fin du combat si certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} sont utilisées ou si le personnage perd {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}connaissance{/g}.
languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une cible en {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}feu{/g} subit des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. La cible effectue également un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} à chaque round. Si la cible réussit ce test, elle cesse de brûler avant de subir un nouveau round de dégâts de feu émanant de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}. L'effet de combustion est supprimé à la fin du combat moyennant certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} ou si le personnage perd {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}connaissance{/g}.

languages.text: 处于燃烧状态的目标，每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。目标每轮需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。如果检定成功，目标可以解除燃烧效果，下一轮不会再受到火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。战斗结束时或角色{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}时，燃烧效果同样会被解除。此外，某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}也可以解除燃烧效果。
languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态的目标，每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。目标每轮需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果检定成功，目标可以解除{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}燃烧{/g}效果，下一轮不会再受到火焰伤害。战斗结束时或角色{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}时，燃烧效果同样会被解除。此外，某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}也可以解除燃烧效果。

languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire damage from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat by using certain abilities or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

languages.text: Un objetivo con quemadura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El objetivo también realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} cada asalto. Si supera la prueba, deja de arder antes de sufrir otro asalto de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de fuego por este efecto. De no hacerlo, el efecto quemadura se puede eliminar al final del combate con ciertas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} o cuando el personaje cae {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}.
languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un objetivo con {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} sufre {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El objetivo también realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} cada asalto. Si la supera, deja de arder antes de sufrir otra ronda de daño de fuego por este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}. De no hacerlo, el efecto quemadura se puede eliminar al final del combate con ciertas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} o cuando el personaje cae {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}.

languages.text: 炎上しているターゲットは各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎上ダメージ{/g}を負う。ターゲットは各ラウンドで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う。ターゲットが判定に成功すると、別のラウンドでその効果による炎上{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける前に炎上が止まる。あるいは、キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になった場合には、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}使用により戦闘終了時に炎上効果が消える。
languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}しているターゲットは各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎上ダメージ{/g}を負う。ターゲットは各ラウンドで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。ターゲットが判定に成功すると、別のラウンドでその{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}による炎上ダメージを受ける前に炎上が止まる。あるいは、キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になった場合には、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}使用により戦闘終了時に炎上効果が消える。

languages.text: Yanan bir hedef, her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alır. Hedef aynı zamanda her turda {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girer. Hedef, bu testten başarıyla çıkarsa bir raunt daha ateş {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} almadan yanma durur. Yanma etkisi buna ilaveten çatışmanın sonunda, belirli bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetleri{/g} kullanarak veya karakter {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düştüğünde kalkar.
languages.original_text: A burning target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The target also makes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} each round. If the target succeeds on this test, it stops burning before it suffers another round of fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the effect. Alternatively, the burning effect is removed at the end of combat, by using certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, or if the character falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.
